desc: 60% Def, Rec, max HP (Light), fills BB gauge each turn, 50% Light elemental damage, normal attacks fills BB gauge, probable 1 KO resistance & fills BB gauge at turn start instead

dictionary.lore:
A brightly polished helmet with a protective visor owned by the exuberant craftsman Peter. Even in human form, the celestial rabbit boasted an agility like no other, being able to lend his fellow animals a helping hand on top of his own tasks.

Part of Peter's work ethic is to always prepare as many solutions as possible to any problems that may arise. Unfortunately, this also means a complete lack of planning or foresight, and the sheer amount of roundabout repair work is in itself a hazard. Little wonder his colleagues refer to his helmet as a brain-bucket.

name: Harebrain Bucket
